biotools.summary:
A Bioconductor and Bioconda package for differential extreme value analysis.

A tool for differential extreme-value analysis.

Differential extreme outlier analysis using Blacksheep.

https://blacksheep.readthedocs.io/en/master/.

conda install -c bioconda blksheep.

Requirements (automatically taken care of with pip and conda)
